Highly recommended for history enthusiasts as well as those interested in human psychology. It also makes a good read for casual readers.\n

column4: Humans in the Life Cycle of Earth
column5:
All of we humans think. We don't really know what is thinking. We understand without knowing what is understanding. Claim intelligence, without clarity of its meaning.
This book traces 50000years of Home Sapiens - that is ourselves and what we did to life on Earth.
It points to our weakness of trusting Myths and imaginary things over reality. Don't feel bad for #FakeNews on social media. Entire human evolution is built upon FAKE MYTHs.
Must read without any WHITE SPACE or Prior Judgement from your earlier readings.
Is this also another Myth another imagination created by a smart author. Lot of his assertions qualify for being a marketed Myth! You take the call! If you still want to investigate this cyclic counterfeit reality, read about MAYA as given by one earlier author - Sankaracharya!

I have read quite a number of books that ended up disappointing me. Some of those were gifted by well-meaning friends. Some of them were books I bought on an impulse. Then there were books that I had waited years to read only to find them unworthy of all those years of patience. But this book by Yuval Noah Harari tops the list. Just imagine reading a book that all your friends were going gaga about, only to find that there is nothing worthwhile in it and wondering whether you are really a good reader at all, now that you don‚Äôt even like a book that the whole world around you seems to love!

Let‚Äôs clear a few things first, before you think of bashing me up. This is a commendable effort by Mr. Harari to summarize the whole history of mankind and its evolutionary tale. During the initial pages, I too thought that this will be one of the best reads on anthropology. But this book promises a lot only to deceive. We statisticians use the term confirmation bias, which means the tendency to favor and present only those information that are supportive to one‚Äôs beliefs. This book is full of them. Harari had decided to present all that is wicked and weak about Homo Sapiens and he has succeeded to a large extent.

Not that I am complaining. I for one have never held the notion that we humans are special beings sitting atop the food chain, placed there by a favorable god who created us all in his (or, is it a ‚Äòher‚Äô?) own image. I think of us as a different species of apes that managed to evolve a little quicker than our cousins. Despite our use of advanced languages, costly clothes and snazzy gadgets, internally we remain the beasts that roamed the vast forests once. I see nothing special about being human. This book helped cement that belief in my mind by discussing the idiocies and idiosyncrasies of our species as a whole.

But that‚Äôs just about it. This book isn‚Äôt ‚Äòa brief history of humankind‚Äô, but the opinions of Mr. Harari about the various aspects of human evolution. This isn‚Äôt a chronological history in the lines of ‚ÄòWhat on Earth Happened?‚Äô by Christopher Lloyd or ‚ÄòA Short History of Nearly Everything‚Äô by Bill Bryson, both of which I found to be far more informative and interesting than this one. This is both a philosophical take and passing of judgments by Mr. Harari on what he considers to be the vital cogs of human evolution, namely Cognitive Revolution, Agricultural Revolution & Scientific Revolution. There is nothing that you end up learning that you already didn‚Äôt learn, especially in case you had read those two aforementioned books.

Sorry, dear friends. I have read much better books. 2.5 stars!

Sapiens had been that one book everyone would keep recommending to read. It was so intriguing for me to read this book (with special mention to my inconsistent non-fiction love) and I've been waiting to get my hands on it.

Everything about this book sounds fascinating... the blurb, the reviews etc. I absolutely loved the first half of the book which talks more about the biological evolution and nomadic and natural lifestyle. It was so very informative and interesting as well.

But the second half didn't stick with me so much because it was full of historic facts, conquests and stuffs. I felt a bit bored at the later point of time though I would say the same may not happen with all the readers.

The book is definitely one of the amazing works and a must read for anyone interested in history and the way we humans have become the supremacy on Earth. It in fact made me feel all these advancements we make leads us no where but destruction.

If you ask me which book apart from fiction would I cherish forever, it would be this book. Because, I knew I would read this book so many times in future because it has so much in it.

Wrapping up things, read this book of you are genuinely interested and have done enough research beforehand.

\n The book helps in understanding the basics of evolution right from the Stone Age till date. It explains the deep human thinking and approach to survival and growth. Several of the beliefs and narrative can be applied to ones present life and surroundings. A must read !\n

column4: Combination of History, Philosophy and Psychology
column5:
Product delivery by Amazon was on time.No issue about it.When I started reading it,I was hoping that I would be reading about World History ,Wars,Empires, Important features of history but book is not like that.It starts from Great Apes and ends with modern day Human.But during this journey Author has divided book into four Parts.
Part 1:The cognitive Revolution: Various Human species,their beginning, their lifestyles etc.
Part 2:The Agricultural Revolution:How agriculture started and how it is one of the biggest frauds(you will come to know when you read this book)
Part 3:The Unification of Humankind:Here he tells about Religion,Empires etc.
Part 4:The Scientific Revolution:Here he has mentioned the time from renaissance to the modern Industrial Revolution and How human done this journey.He talks about Capitalism, Communism, Nationalism.The theory of Capitalism is explained in lucid manner which can be understood by anyone.He has explained all th pros and cons of each system which is very worthwhile to read.In the end He has tried to predict future of Homo Sapiens .You will amaze to read this book.
It is combination of History, Phychology and Philosophy.He has given explanation of the things and the way they are today.It will surely enhance our knowledge about our own species.
It is definitely worthwhile to read this.

column4: How to know if yours is a Genuine copy
column5:

The current Corona pandemic has given us a lot of time to think about nature & how humankind has impacted it. We share planet Earth with so many diverse animal & plant species, but no other species has changed this planet to the extent we humans have. I always wondered why humans? Why us?
I got my answers in ‚ÄòSapiens‚Äô. A brilliantly written masterpiece by Dr Yuval Noah Harari on history of humankind. Dr Harari has very elaborately explained why Homo Sapiens are different. What has propelled this one species from being just another life form to becoming the most dominant biological entity on Earth? Dr Harari says what distinguishes Homo Sapiens from others is our ability to believe in imagined entities. This enables us to cooperate in large groups.
‚ÄúLarge numbers of strangers can cooperate successfully by believing in common myths. Any large-scale human cooperation ‚Äì whether a modern state, a medieval church, an ancient city or an archaic tribe ‚Äì is rooted in common myths that exist only in people‚Äôs collective imagination‚Äù
Homo Deus on the other hand talks about future of Homo Sapiens. The future that author has talked about can be a wonder ride, scary, shocking for you depending on how you look at it. If you have already read Sapiens you will feel the Homo Deus being repetitive. Author has devoted significant portion talking about why Homo Sapiens have been successful till now. Most of the key challenges Homo Sapiens faced till 20th century have already been resolved. But will we remain satisfied just because we resolved challenges we have been facing till now? Author says ‚ÄòNo‚Äô
‚ÄúWe do not become satisfied by leading a peaceful and prosperous existence. Rather, we become satisfied when reality matches our expectations. The bad news is that as conditions improve, expectations balloon‚Äù -Homo Deus
If you want to know what we will be up to I strongly recommend Homo Deus to you. I am sure you will be shocked to read all the possibilities that future holds for our kind.

I have special interest in History as i love it as subject. I have read many history books not only modern but also ancient or books on prehistory. But after reading Homosapiens i am just overwhelmed that how the author has presented evolution of human history in such a simplistic , unique and analytical manner.
 This book not only details anthropological evidences or facts but it covers all scenarios to present the picture whether it is biology, genetics, culture, science , environment etc.
I loved the way the author covered the issue and aspects of religion in human history from early man till today. How and why religion evolved , and how religion is directly related to political and economic power.
This book will help you in critical analysis of what we are fed or what we study. This book will force you to form your opinion based on facts and logic rather than some religion or superstitions. Some of the best chapters in the book are:
1 History biggest fraud
2 There is no justice in history
3 The law of religion
4 The marriage of Science and
 Empires
5 The End of Homosapiens.

This book is must read for not only student of history but for all those who are curious enough to understand the concept of how human history evolved.

BOOK SPECIFICATIONS :
1 Book : Sapiens
2 Author : Yuval Noah Harari
3 Language : English
4 Year : 2015
5 Publisher : Penguin
6 Parts/Chapters : 5/20

SAPIENS by Yuval Noah Harari is one of the most important books of the 21st century. It is an eye opener and as informative as it can get. Harari has literally compiled all the information about our planet and our species and put it in this book. It tells us of the reason why the world that we live in today is the way it is. This book is very informative and important and cannot be described as a casual read.
I am a quick reader. I can finish a book in a few hours or a day or two, but this book has literally taken me weeks to finish. And I don‚Äôt think it is a bad thing at all. It just contains so much information and has so much to tell that I needed time to process all that I was reading about. I would literally stop after a certain topic so I could think about it and process it all and then pick up the book again. No book, and I mean no book at all, can come up to this level of importance on the ‚Äòmust-read‚Äô scale.
It is very important for us to read this book and understand the way that we as humans have evolved in every way since existing on this planet and the consequences of our decisions on other humans, beings and most importantly, this planet.

column4: Humans in the Life Cycle of Earth
column5:
All of we humans think. We don't really know what is thinking. We understand without knowing what is understanding. Claim intelligence, without clarity of its meaning.
This book traces 50000years of Home Sapiens - that is ourselves and what we did to life on Earth.
It points to our weakness of trusting Myths and imaginary things over reality. Don't feel bad for #FakeNews on social media. Entire human evolution is built upon FAKE MYTHs.
Must read without any WHITE SPACE or Prior Judgement from your earlier readings.
Is this also another Myth another imagination created by a smart author. Lot of his assertions qualify for being a marketed Myth! You take the call! If you still want to investigate this cyclic counterfeit reality, read about MAYA as given by one earlier author - Sankaracharya!

I have read quite a number of books that ended up disappointing me. Some of those were gifted by well-meaning friends. Some of them were books I bought on an impulse. Then there were books that I had waited years to read only to find them unworthy of all those years of patience. But this book by Yuval Noah Harari tops the list. Just imagine reading a book that all your friends were going gaga about, only to find that there is nothing worthwhile in it and wondering whether you are really a good reader at all, now that you don‚Äôt even like a book that the whole world around you seems to love!

Let‚Äôs clear a few things first, before you think of bashing me up. This is a commendable effort by Mr. Harari to summarize the whole history of mankind and its evolutionary tale. During the initial pages, I too thought that this will be one of the best reads on anthropology. But this book promises a lot only to deceive. We statisticians use the term confirmation bias, which means the tendency to favor and present only those information that are supportive to one‚Äôs beliefs. This book is full of them. Harari had decided to present all that is wicked and weak about Homo Sapiens and he has succeeded to a large extent.

Not that I am complaining. I for one have never held the notion that we humans are special beings sitting atop the food chain, placed there by a favorable god who created us all in his (or, is it a ‚Äòher‚Äô?) own image. I think of us as a different species of apes that managed to evolve a little quicker than our cousins. Despite our use of advanced languages, costly clothes and snazzy gadgets, internally we remain the beasts that roamed the vast forests once. I see nothing special about being human. This book helped cement that belief in my mind by discussing the idiocies and idiosyncrasies of our species as a whole.

But that‚Äôs just about it. This book isn‚Äôt ‚Äòa brief history of humankind‚Äô, but the opinions of Mr. Harari about the various aspects of human evolution. This isn‚Äôt a chronological history in the lines of ‚ÄòWhat on Earth Happened?‚Äô by Christopher Lloyd or ‚ÄòA Short History of Nearly Everything‚Äô by Bill Bryson, both of which I found to be far more informative and interesting than this one. This is both a philosophical take and passing of judgments by Mr. Harari on what he considers to be the vital cogs of human evolution, namely Cognitive Revolution, Agricultural Revolution & Scientific Revolution. There is nothing that you end up learning that you already didn‚Äôt learn, especially in case you had read those two aforementioned books.

Sorry, dear friends. I have read much better books. 2.5 stars!

Sapiens had been that one book everyone would keep recommending to read. It was so intriguing for me to read this book (with special mention to my inconsistent non-fiction love) and I've been waiting to get my hands on it.

Everything about this book sounds fascinating... the blurb, the reviews etc. I absolutely loved the first half of the book which talks more about the biological evolution and nomadic and natural lifestyle. It was so very informative and interesting as well.

But the second half didn't stick with me so much because it was full of historic facts, conquests and stuffs. I felt a bit bored at the later point of time though I would say the same may not happen with all the readers.

The book is definitely one of the amazing works and a must read for anyone interested in history and the way we humans have become the supremacy on Earth. It in fact made me feel all these advancements we make leads us no where but destruction.

If you ask me which book apart from fiction would I cherish forever, it would be this book. Because, I knew I would read this book so many times in future because it has so much in it.

Wrapping up things, read this book of you are genuinely interested and have done enough research beforehand.

\n The book helps in understanding the basics of evolution right from the Stone Age till date. It explains the deep human thinking and approach to survival and growth. Several of the beliefs and narrative can be applied to ones present life and surroundings. A must read !\n

column4: Combination of History, Philosophy and Psychology
column5:
Product delivery by Amazon was on time.No issue about it.When I started reading it,I was hoping that I would be reading about World History ,Wars,Empires, Important features of history but book is not like that.It starts from Great Apes and ends with modern day Human.But during this journey Author has divided book into four Parts.
Part 1:The cognitive Revolution: Various Human species,their beginning, their lifestyles etc.
Part 2:The Agricultural Revolution:How agriculture started and how it is one of the biggest frauds(you will come to know when you read this book)
Part 3:The Unification of Humankind:Here he tells about Religion,Empires etc.
Part 4:The Scientific Revolution:Here he has mentioned the time from renaissance to the modern Industrial Revolution and How human done this journey.He talks about Capitalism, Communism, Nationalism.The theory of Capitalism is explained in lucid manner which can be understood by anyone.He has explained all th pros and cons of each system which is very worthwhile to read.In the end He has tried to predict future of Homo Sapiens .You will amaze to read this book.
It is combination of History, Phychology and Philosophy.He has given explanation of the things and the way they are today.It will surely enhance our knowledge about our own species.
It is definitely worthwhile to read this.

column4: This book will give you the key to the most awesome power within your reach!

This remarkable book has already helped readers the world over achieve the seemingly impossible just by learning how to bring the incredible force of the subconscious under their control. Now you, too, can learn these powerful techniques for changing your life simply by changing your beliefs. 

Dr. Murphy combines time-honored spiritual wisdom with cutting-edge scientific research to explain the influence of the subconscious mind on everything you do. And he presents simple, practical, and proven-effective exercises that can turn your mind into a powerful tool for improving your everyday life. Filled with inspiring real-life success stories, this invaluable user's guide to your mind will unlock the secrets to success in whatever endeavor you choose. 

Inside you'll discover how to use the subconscious mind to:
* Increase health and even cure the body of many common ailments
* Get the promotion you want, the raise you need, the recognition you deserve
* Build the confidence to do the things you never dared -- but always wanted -- to do in life
* Develop friendships and enhance existing relationships with co-workers, family, and friends
* Strengthen your marriage or primary love relationship
* Overcome phobias, compulsions, and bad habits
* Learn the secret of "eternal youth" and much, much more!

With this book as your guide, there are no LIMITS to the prosperity, happiness, and peace of mind you can achieve simply by using The Power of Your Subconscious Mind.

column5: \n I didn't expect the way this book turned out to be. The author has, while talking about the subconscious mind; has completely neglected the practicality and reality of one's life; and mental pictures of such things are unable to take. I was waiting for a bit of uoliftment every now and then, but I was sadly disappointed. There are some great lines/thoughts in the book, but, the book doesn't really fulfill its purpose of what it's meant to be; that is, finding and applying the power of one's subconscious mind. This is my opinion; one can obviously read and decide accordingly :)\n

column4: Beautifully explain how our mind works.!!
column5:

This books gives us information about how our mind works and the explanation by Dr. Murphy is so easy to understand, simple words. Ones you start reading it will be so hard for you to stop, because it's so interesting and informative, And our brain feels that we are learning something which helps us to make ourselves better, Its very important to understand how our mind function, How positive and negative thoughts works in our mind, And this will help you to tackle many situation in life, in which we get angry, sad, frustrated or think its not possible.

column4: The Power of your Subconscious Mind
column5:
First things first, I really wanted to read this book because it is very much hyped, so I decided to give it a read.
The cover, Oh My god!! It is so attractive, so beautiful, so colourful, I fell in love with the cover just when I opened the package.
Even the blank spaces in the cover have been used with such beautiful detailing.
The title is very much appropriate.
Dr. Murphy has covered every possible point in this book related to our subconscious mind. For example, telling our subconscious mind about being happy repeatedly and we actually start feeling happy.
This book has a collection of prayers to relax your mind, body and soul.
A perfect book to relax you mind.

The book is too interesting....must read once in life.
Never say : I can't..... overcome that fear by ur subconscious mind....
This book is really hope giving....
Choose life! Choose love! Choose health! Choose happiness! this is the mantra of life!!!

Hit helpful button if u like my review..!

Lighting fast 1 day delivery by Amazon....thanks amazon!

column4: It can change your life,mindset , and way of viewing the world.
column5:
It is Beautiful book and it has actually changed the way I look and perceive things . In the entire book Joseph murphy focuses on the massive power of our subcounscious mind which is unknown to many.It all revolves around our belief and the way we think things to be,it is actually made true by our subcounscious mind. If we believe that we are the most happy human being on this earth, we do not have any problems in our lives, it will be made true by your subcounscious mind and you will experience those things. Even the incurable diseses have been cured because the person believed and had complete faith that he will be cured. It is nothing but the subcounscious mind that has the power to heal your mind and body. Just loved the way Joseph murphy has given evidences and practical examples of the power of our subcounscious mind. Recommending this book to all those who are experiencing a rough patch in their lives. Trust me you will never regret buying this book Joseph murphy is like my life coach.
Happy reading :)

The author has illustrated the difference between the conscious and subconscious mind and how they relate to each other by citing some life lessons/examples/anecdotes.. He has concisely explained how any thought/suggestion that we impose on our subconscious mind gets impregnated with constant belief and affirmations and therefore yields the desired results/reactions.. The book entails multiple techniques (visualisation, meditation) and healing practices (placebo effect) to utilise the power of our subconscious to derive happiness from within, to rejuvenate health, to attract wealth, to heal relationships, and ultimately to receive what we seek..

 Below are few highlights from the book:

üéØThink good and good follows. Think evil and evil follows. You are what you think all day long.
üéØAs you sow in your subconscious mind, so shall you reap in your body and environment.
üéØImagine your subconscious mind as a bed of rich soil that will help all kinds of seeds to sprout and flourish, whether good or bad.
üéØEvery thought is a cause, and every condition is an effect. This is the reason it is so essential that you take charge of your thoughts. In that way, you can bring forth only desirable conditions.
üéØYou have the power to choose. Choose life! Chose love! Choose health! Choose happiness!

Book Review!!
The Power of Your Subconscious mind by Dr Joseph Murphy. It has an impact to change your perspectives towards life for the better. Also, the author has given a fine light on both the conscious and subconscious mind. As a non-fictional book, this book says a lot about many things from staying positive to controlling your mind and emotions.

Though the flow is not always good in this book and even some chapters sounded too heavy that was next to impossible to tolerate. On the brighter side, some chapters were really good and on the point. That is the only reason that giving 3.5 stars out of 5 would not be a bad option at all.

Lastly, you can't take this one as a regular self-help book. This is a bit different and some concepts are explained superbly by the author. Anyone who likes to read a book about controlling the mind and winning life then he/she must grab this as the title goes.

Fav Quote: "Busy your mind with the concepts of harmony, health, peace, and good will, and wonders will happen in your life."

Rating: 3.5/5

So i ordered same size boxer (80-85). But this boxer is too large. It fits fine at waist bt looks like shorts. So this is uncomfortable to use as underpants. This is non-replaceable so i have to use it as shorts.
If given a choice i would have replaced it for a size smaller.

column4: set of 2 in XXL size. Size doesn't matches the label and chart.
column5:
Pros:
good colour.
good leg and in-seam length.

Cons:
fabric feels to be poly or teri cotton , not pure cotton.
I bought pack of 2 and as you can see in pics, blue one is bigger at waist than white one.
Size is not as per label. Label states XXL, but when I am comparing these with my old XXL boxer (same measurements in cm too), new ones are almost 2 inches smaller than my old one.

I don't understand why garment manufacturers are not following standard sizes, forget about international standards. All I expect is that size in cm or inches should be stated and should match final product.

Since sizing is wrong, I can not recommend these to anyone.

At this price point this is a very good boxer shorts. I washed it twice in the washing machine, no color loss, elastic retained its shape. Comfortable to wear, the elastic is soft on skin.
Read some reviews about its not cotton, but as for me, whether it's cotton or not, the material is soft and good to wear, seems durable too.

column4: Worst Track Pant I Ever Purchased
column5:
I bought this track pant after reading so many positive reviews. But this was the worst track pant I ever purchased in my life. Washed it first time in the washing machine and lots of threads got stuck to it, really???? (Pics attached for your reference).
Also it‚Äôs bit tight from waist, however I ordered the correct size according to waist. It‚Äôs also not 100% cotton, it‚Äôs cotton rich, it‚Äôs smooth but thin material.
I wanted to tell you guys please don‚Äôt buy this high priced track pant.
I have previously used Playboy, Ajile and Duke track pants and they were much lower priced and much better quality. USPA is also good but it‚Äôs higher priced.

Description mentioned zippered pockets to hold keys, phones. I find none.

It's a regular track pant of a probably better quality than the cheaper versions.

But I don't see why I've to buy this over a Jockey or Fila or whatever similar brands are available in the market! It's not even cheap!

\n Material and stitching both are unbelievable. During hot summer in India having 40 to 45 degrees temperature, this type of track pant is very handy. Elastic is awesome. Most attractive part is discount. Bought just 540 while MRP is above 900. You must prefer this over other brands surely.\n

\n I was initially skeptical about the quality and fit as I have never seen Van Heusen lounge wear in a store otherwise. But wow, these are awesome. The quality is great. It was neatly packed and delivered in perfect condition. Fit is perfect as well. No complaints. I like the design as well. These are really loungewear. Easy to wear with sandals and even shoes.\n

column4: Product description -- size mentioned is not accurate
column5:
I had to return the product twice and not go for it ultimately because, the sizes mentioned are all inaccurate. Having ordered for Medium Size because my waist is 34 inches, I found that it is really two big for me. Then ordered Small size only to find that it is also uncomfortably loose for my waist. Ultimately I found out that the size chart displayed on the website doesn't really correspond to what is printed on the item itself. There is no size below small available for it. Hence had to drop the purchase altogether. The seller should keep this disparity in mind when goods are being sold for the Indian market.

On material quality and workmanship I can't rate them yet, because I have not been able to use it.

column4: Perfect cycling shorts to wear under jeans & trousers. Excellent quality under 900rs
column5:
Off late I ordered this pair of cycling shorts since I was a bit weary of the BTWIN shorts which I was using. These costed under 900rs which is a great price point for something this good in quality.

What is Good:

- The fit was excellent. Its a bit longer than traditional shorts. So it does grip the quads & hams very well. Helps in longer rides - the added support & compression.
- The padding is very good. May not be Brevet grade but should be perfect for city rides. I have done 45-50km rides in this & they held up pretty well. No fatigue whatsoever.
- The Material is spandex based and breathes very well. Moisture wicking to say the least. The mesh material feels natural & light on your skin.
- The circumference around the thighs have this anti slip rubber lining which helps a lot to keep these in place. What is even better is that the rubber lining becomes more sticky as you sweat.
- Feels natural to wear under a trouser or a pair of jeans. Please note, these will add a bit of bulk to your waist so if you wear a tight pair of jeans or trousers, it may become tight for comfort. But with an average pair of jeans, these are perfect to wear all day. There is a bit of bulge around the back which is to be expected given the padding. Yes- it is possible to wear it all day under jeans.
- Quick dry material. So once I reach office, I take these off and drop em off on the bike to dry out. And I have noticed that these are dry within a hour or two.

What could have been improved:

- Sizing is very confusing. And I realized this after having to return & reorder the product once. The sizing imagine should make it clear as to why. Asian Size is L but American Size is S while European size is M. For Indian, Asian size is the best reference. American size as always plus sizes.
- This leads to the next point. I ordered Size M (Asian) which I exchanged for Size S (Asian). I usually wear size 32 jeans in Levis. Which means, anyone who has a slimmer waistline than 32 inches won't be able to get a size smaller than Size S. Since they dont have XS.

Nonetheless, these are great for everyday usage.

Overall, this is a good product for the price. I use it for commuting to work everyday. So far, I have had not reason to complain - especially given the attractive price. And the padding is pretty great!

I am a regular cyclist and quite often feel burn and uncomfortable down while riding...I was using decathlon shorts also...but in same price I got this item and trust me this foam is better then the one I got from decathlon

Really..it feels so different and more over more convenient... I hv increased my ride time and no lower pain at all....I will buy more after a month

column4: Decent quality. Consider hip-size for waist-size and you should get perfect fit.
column5:
As evident from all other reviews, I was trying to get the right fit the first time. I found most of the users have ended up purchasing a size higher when they ordered based on waist-size chart provided in the product picture.

My waist is 34 inches. If I considered XL (going by size chart), I would have ended up with a very loose shorts (as complained by others). Instead I checked for 34 inches in Hip size and the closest one is "S" i.e. Small. So I went with that.
Item was delivered yesterday and I found it fit perfectly.

1 star dropped for the high price. This is china made and the ideal price should have been around Rs.500/-. I paid Rs.998. Nevertheless it's a good buy and I would recommend this for anybody planning to go on long trips on bike.
-------------
Also, if the vendor is reading reviews, by now he should have uploaded the correct size chart to avoid the unnecessary time spent on research and trial and errors.

column4: For frequent riders a must have buy.
column5: \n I'm a regular rider, both in bicycle and enfield. Enfield i drive nearly 250kms every week and bicycle around 20~30kms. Because of this I usually get tail bone pain. I have been using this shorts for nearly 4 days and covered nearly 200kms in a day for ride. Feeling was amazing. Not only that I didnt get any tail bone pain, but also I was very comfortable throughout the ride. In bicycle I'm yet to have a long ride. But from the average rides I had so far I'm very comfortable there also. Make sure u get the right size for the best experience. My waist size is 32, I got large size which is very comfortable. Quick delivery too.\n

\n Softness of inbuild pad in cycling shorts is remarkable. It gives relaxation even after 1-2 hrs of cycling.. like it's design ..\n

\n Really comfortable cycling padded shorts.provides enough cushioning for long cycling hours...no problems of discomfort or rashes... please check the size sheet to order correct size ... different from conventional sizes...\n

I usually don't review a product after a 2-3 days usage, but this one made me!

First impression was: product quality is good, rear padding is sufficient, groin padding is thin. So I test rode with a supporter inside the shorts. Did 15 kms uphill without any discomfort. Before the shorts, groin pain would start to surface after 7-8 kms (unless you wear that tight supporter!). On following days, I even got rid of the supporter; no discomfort.

Goes without saying, these come highly recommended from me, especially to those struggling with groin discomfort while riding.

I hope these are durable too. Will come back with an update after some rigorous use!

Also, a note of thank you to fellow riders and the seller for promptly answering answering my queries, and helping to zero in on this buy.

column4: Big and bright display with customizable cloud faces.
column5:
Excellent product... Amazon delivered it a day before the schedule date.. toch is good... Connectivity is good... Strap quality is good... Square dial is big with bright display... Compatible with OnePlus and Mi phones... Customizable cloud faces is the excellent feature to love...
If GPS navigation in this could be an add on it would make the product super duper... but
Overall a Good excellent product from noise... loved the watch in the first look and usage...

After a week of use... The watch is good.. screen bigger and bright as compared to other similar products in range... Battery drainage depends upon use and connectivity... If your phone is out of bluetooth zone... It searches for device and consumes more battery... Many features are as good as in apple watches... Pulse oxymeter, heart rate and other device connectivity like music control is working fine... Overall a Good product at a reasonable price...

\n Watch face is just 40 out of which not 1 looks good and neither does any of the faces have steps count calories burned distance etc. There's no option to download faces from cloud. Fake advertising of 100+ faces. Battery runs out from 100% to 95% in 2 minutes and 65% in 3 hours with no usage. Too much of lag in the app too. Overall save the 4k and invest in something better.\n

Pros: Watch faces are good,
Good battery life,
watch interface is so smooth and well designed,
Heart rate monitor, SPo2, stress monitoring sensors works well

Cons: Noisefit app is worst
Disconnects the watch too often, (It is the major drawback)
Strap is not too extraordinary but just ok.

Not upto the mark of perfection.

Quality seriously compromised.

I was expecting a premium touch which is absolutely missing from the watch. Lets call it a fitness band only and not a smart watch. Its not value for money. Plz go for version 2 over 3.

This is a fitness watch disguised to look like a (apple) smartwatch
Quality is OK for 4K.Rs
Screen resolution is super good at this size but because it's an LCD panel it's not that great
pretty smooth UI
bt 5.0 meh
it's pretty looking tho
Overall 4 stars for this watch

DAY 5 REPORT: I tried some trouble shooting for all problems (read below). Also tried to pair and unpair several times to establish a firm connection. I was able to download and install 2 firmware updates in a mere span of 48 hours pushing the firmware to release 11. Post this bluetooth connectivity has improved. I also had to update the Noise app twice in these 5 days which has improved the connectivity and sync.

The watch was packed with zero battery and firmware 6. Wish Noise had made a better effort at solving issues before shipping the product to customers. Moving my rating from one to 4 stars as the watch has now started performing better and am happier with it now.

Sleep record is good, SPO2 and tracking is good as well.

DAY ONE REPORT: Bluetooth connectivity is iffy to say the least. Doesn‚Äôt pair with the device even while the phone is side by side. Wrist sense is annoying. Comes on only after a second of wrist movement for any other watch face than the default one.

The battery drained in 48 hours. I guess because the device was constantly trying to pair with my phone and couldn‚Äôt.

The noise fit app is riddled with bugs. Especially on startup. The app just doesn‚Äôt move and sticks to a blank screen. A fix for this is that the location needs to be on before switching the app on.

Sleep mode does not work or register any data.

Anguish at trying to connect to the company‚Äôs support after just 48 hours of purchase.

Cannot return or replace, that‚Äôs another hassle all together.

Stuck with this and has left a bitter sense since this is my first wearable. Please skip this brand and model. Better to save 1.5 grand a month for 10 months and buy a Samsung or Apple Watch.

It's looks premium. Is lightweight. The belt is of excellent quality. Easy to setup and is working perfectly fine with all the modes. Best buy at the this price.
Watch rim gets discolored

column4: Bugs in product. Good product if these bugs are fixed.

- When taking bpm reading after swiping 2 times it says "Please keep still" again and again even there is no movement.

- Bluetooth issue.
- Battery charge show 100% from 90% directly in 5sec.

Pros:
- Display is good
- Accuracy is good.

column4: Seems a great option to buy at this price point.
column5:
First impressions-
Love the screen, very light weight, feels good to wear, looks premium.
What could have been better- The chin below the screen could be smaller, more watchfaces should be added.
(Received an update right after switching it on)

19th Feb 2021: Updates after issue got resolved
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1) The troubleshoot provided by Noise support team to solve the connectivity issue mentioned in my first review below did not work. I had to reset the watch and then only it got paired with Noisefit App.
2) Also, they did not provided any resolution on the touch not responding to lit the display.
3) This watch is highly priced but not working as expected. Very upset as it was a gift for my mother.
4) Inside Noisefit App, icons does not respond fast, you have to tap many times to open heartbeat, distance, sleep time, steps,etc. options in the app.

First review-
~~~~~~~~~~~~
I have bought this as a gift for my mother. But unfortunately, this product is causing issues since the very first day(16th Feb) received. I was not expecting this from a very well known brand.

? Pairing and connectivity-
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Installed Noisefit app as per sequence of mobile phones given below-
1) Samsung A21S- After pairing, watch keep getting undiscoverable in Noisefit App.
2) Lenovo K8 Plus- Watch does not get paired after clicking on pairing.
3) iPhone 11 Pro- Same as 1).

? Touch sensitivity-
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The touch is not working properly as sometimes when I touch to see the time, the display does not get lit. Instead, I have to press the side button to turn on the display. Please fix this issue as well.

?Syncing-
~~~~~~~~~
Today, when I turned on the watch, the time did not get sync with current time as well. It shows 08:06 AM, whereas the time was 11:07 AM and my mother called me now(11:57 AM) that the watch time has still not synced with current time and she is going to put the watch in her side bag instead of wearing it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I have paid a huge amount to buy this watch. Please take care of this very responsibly.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Designed in India.
Country of Origin is China.
What can you expect!

Thanks!

column4: Criminal case should be made on the manufacturer for selling a fraud product in such pandemic
column5:
In this pandemic, everyone today needs to monitor his SpO2 , BP, Pulse, and HR continuously. Seeing so many good reviews for this product, I ordered it.
But what a shame...when so many people are dying every minute here due to covid, here is a company which is selling a fake smart watch which reads SpO2 of non-living things also. I checked this watch on woods, bottle , table, books, notebooks, plastic...and it gives SpO2 readings for them also..that too in the range of 97-98!
Resat it, rechecked it so many times and then found that others who purchased this also faced the same.
I am surprised who and what kind of the peope are here who are writing good reviews for this watch, instead of demanding arrest of the manufacturer for making a fraud device and selling it at exorbitant price when people r in desperate need of correct readings.

I have attached a snap of how this watch was giving SpO2 measure of 97% for my notebook. Amazon should take note of this review, verify it, and blacklist this manufacturer and seller as well as possible initiate legal action against them for jeopardizing lives. It's not joke man. Many r dying here every minute due to vultures and collapsed character of people to collapsed system.

After going through so many views and YouTube clips for this watch, finally I purchased this. Display is quite good but display time is too short so here it's a disappointment. Battery back up very good. Regarding health fitness measures, then I am skeptical about this because when I measured SPO2 with another device there was a difference. Also, when during night when I put it aside, the fitness measure light kept blinking... Why so ?

Would like again to write that display time should be prolonged though app option. Otherwise, it's a nice smartwatch.

The smart watch is a very useful device in this age of the pandemic - I monitor my Oxygen level, BP, Heart rate/ continuous Heart rate and sleep patterns , every day to get an idea of my health status.
The BP readings are not accurate - readings are high !
Heart rate and SpO2 calories consumed and steps walked readings are pretty accurate !
The watch face dwell time is too short and not enough to appreciate the display fully in one view - there is no way of enhancing the view time of display - that is a big disappointed.
The different watch faces available to suit your convenience is a plus of this watch.
It is built well and looks smart !
I am happy with smart watch - it is value for money !??

\n Talking about the product, firstly, for the price, it is an amazing buy. It looks and feels premium. Initially I was a little sceptical of the product especially the color bit of it, but I was more than happy when I saw the product physically, the color was the same as shown online. Nothing was off the card, whatever was mentioned on the product discription the same delivered, be it in terms of its look and even the features. The accuracy of the Oximeter and the pulse check, is I would say 90%. You see, none of the products can accurately guve a reading. The display is legible and easy to read. Its comfortable to wear and has no sharp edges. It's been just a day, and I am Impressed. How it holds up in a longer run will be something to watch out for.. column4: Very Good smart Watch in a Budget
column5:
I am very happy with my purchase. This is my 1st watch. I have used mostly all features in the 1 week I have used it.
1. It measures the BP, heart rate and SPO2 quite accurately
2. The steps counting is also fairly accurate
3. I set the feature on for walk reminder and it never fails to surprise me. Whenever I have been sitting for quite sometime, it vibrates and reminds me.
4. Women can track their monthly cycles too and set reminders
5. The dafit app is reasonably good but could be improved.

All in all a very good purchase to start with.

column4: Absolutely Best in the price range..
column5:
Writing this review after one week of usage.
Delivery by Amazon is good. Item delivered within three days in awesome condition.
Coming to the product itself...
The look is trendy and cool. Checked the precision of spo2 measurements with oxymeterand accurate readings everytime. Same for BP and heart rate.
The step counter is as accurate as a fitbit on comparison which is 8 times costlier.
Using it for last 7 days continuously all day and night even in the shower. No glitches till now and still have 45 percent battery remaining. So I guess at least ten days of back up on full charge which is pretty decent in this price range.
The Dafit app is also very nice. Only one issue with the app so far..it is not able to sync with Google Fit. So minus one star just for that.
Overall, an awesome smartwatch in this price range. Just go for it.

column5:
Received this today. It's pretty basic fitness band in the shape of smart watch. Installed Noisefit app on phone and connected the watch via Bluetooth.

1. No call notifications , whatsapp, facebook, messages notifications received on watch.

2. Watch has only 8 basic menus. 5 watch faces to choose from.

3. Watches switches off screen automatically in 5 seconds with no option to change it.

4. Music control does not work.
5. Menstrual cycle tracking app is not present.

Looks like the seller shipped another basic noise fit watch in this pro 2 box.

My suggestion - Do not buy.
\n The grey strap is killing it . Best watch under 3k. The app is also super cool but they're some glitches at times but it's improving everyday.\n

column4: DON'T BUY THIS BLOODY BAND..DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
column5: \n I bought this band seeing the features..now i regret why i have purchased..i want to shift back to MI fit which is the best band in affordable price and it worth it..i have attached pics..pls take a look.. before midnight 12 it is showing as goal completed 10k steps..after 12 it is showing that my step count is ZERO..app never syncs the data..we have to manually sync the data else it won't detect..even detected with errors..if you are seriously a fitness freak or if you want to loose weight by making 10k steps daily..PLEASE STAY AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT..DON'T BUY THIS AND REGRET LIKE ME..WORST PRODUCT..IT IS TRUE THAT ALL GLITTER ARE NOT GOLD..I HAVE CONTACTED THEIR SUPPORT..ESCALATING THE ISSUE..NO PROPER RESPONSE..NO UPDATES TO THE APP..FEMALE MENSTRUAL CYCLE DATA IS WORST PART..I CALCULATE FAR BETTER THAN THE APP\n

column4: As for person who is looking for fitness goals in life can go for it premium looks!!!
column5:
Most smartwatches offer more or less of similar functionalities except for the ones where we can take calls on the watch itself but some time calling feature do not work. I wanted to get an Apple Watch for myself as I was impressed by the design but fortunately as I thought being a fitness goals this Noise ColorFit will be ok as, which looks very similar and premium like the Apple watch. Bought this one for Rs.2999.

----------------------
IN THE BOX I RECEIVED
----------------------
? The smart watch module with screen protector applied
? 22mm wide TPU strap
? Charging cable
? Instruction Manual and Warranty Registration card

--------------------
ALL ? FEATURES AS MENTION ABOVE IN DESCRIPTION ARE SAME
--------------------
? 1.3 inch 240x240 capacitive display
? Curved glass with anti-fingerprint coating,
? IP68 Full dustproof and waterproof
? 210 mah battery - 7 to 10 days usage, 45 days standby
? Bluetooth 5.0 BLE
? 24/7 heart Rate sensor, sedentary alarm, breathe feature, and usual health and sleep monitoring.
? App, message, social media and call notifications.
? Music control
? Menstrual cycle tracking
? 9 sports mode - Walk, Yoga, Spin, Run, Climb, Workout, Bike, Hike, Treadmill.

------------------------------------
MY PERSONAL EXPERIENCE
------------------------------------

As when I received the watch it looks so premium and classic, when I take the watch in hand it was light in weight after all the feature were normal if I compare to apple watch not up to mark cause I have used apple Watch 3 it is full of features can't noise beat apple but at this price rate it's good to go with it fulfills all the feature which a fitness person needs. As I am giving this review over 2 months used then sharing my persoal experience.
If you liked it please let me know.
Thanks for Noise to make this watch ????!!!

Not worth Rs.3499.
Performance:- First of all, there is no sleep tracking. There are 9 sports modes - walk, run, treadmill, bike, hike, climbing, workout, spinning, yoga. There are No Call functions, No Camera control,
Battery:- Lasts for about 10-11 days which is a good thing. You won't complain about battery anyway.
Quality:- soft silicon belt is nice and no problem with the skin.
Display:- little scratches starts to appear without protection, although with me using it rough, it is nice though.
Disadvantage:- I bought 2 of them(1 for my friend) and the firmware version in the watch is different for both even after update. I had multiple customisable dials options available in one watch, while only 5 fixed dials in the other one which is really disappointing.
Final verdict:- if you're first time smartwatch buyer, it is better than your analog and digital watch but not a real smartwatch as it misses out many functions. Would suggest you to increase your budget and get a real smartwatch from fossil, oppo or apple.
Also if you're still looking forward to buy this wait for sale, the price drops significantly.

\n If you want more features then you have to add more money... If we talk. About the watch it has some good features that one should need in daily routine like notification of WhatsApp messages calls but the Bluetooth range is not that good also battery backup is not upto the expectations... I bought this for my younger brother as he just got his new phone and during his online classes when he was on break can put the phone on charge and watch gives notification after break gets over so quiet useful for him... If your budget is under 3k for smart watch then go for it..\n

column4: 4.5 ?Awesome design, good specs and features. MiBand crusher.
column5:
Most smartwatches and smartband offer more or less of similar functionalities except for the ones where we can take calls on the watch itself. I wanted to get an Apple Watch for my wife as I was impressed by the design but fortunately I found this Noise ColorFit Pro 2 which looks very similar and premium like the Apple watch. Bought this one for Rs.2999.

----------------------
?? IN THE BOX
----------------------
? The smart watch module with screen protector applied
? 22mm wide TPU strap
? Charging cable
? Instruction Manual and Warranty Registration card

--------------------
? FEATURES
--------------------
? 1.3 inch 240x240 capacitive display
? Curved glass with anti-fingerprint coating,
? IP68 Full dustproof and waterproof
? 210 mah battery - 7 to 10 days usage, 45 days standby
? Bluetooth 5.0 BLE
? 24/7 heart Rate sensor, sedentary alarm, breathe feature, and usual health and sleep monitoring.
? App, message, social media and call notifications.
? Music control
? Menstrual cycle tracking
? 9 sports mode - Walk, Yoga, Spin, Run, Climb, Workout, Bike, Hike, Treadmill.

---------------------
??? MY USAGE
---------------------
? At just 35g weight and 22mm TPU band makes this band the very comfortable to wear. Also the strap is skin friendly and I didn‚Äôt get allergy with sweat on this band.
? The straps is easy to swap and replace if required and uses the spring pin type.
? The charging is a magnetic ping type and there is no need to remove straps or do anything. I felt this type of charging the easiest of all.
? The looks is very premium, though is made up of polycarbonate, the grey and black colors, the curved display on the sides and the size make it look like an Apple Watch.
? There are only 5 of watch faces and some of them are like the Apple watch face design. As of now the watch faces are limited and customization is limited, I hope customizations will be made available.
? The display is beautiful and under direct sunlight I found the watch display visible, though not the best visibility but to a certain extent.
? There is 1 button the side which looks like the watch crown and it acts as the function button and return button. I found it easy to navigate using the touch display and using this button.
? The IP68 certification means now I I don't have to worry about protection from water even more than 1m depth (IP_8) and also no need to worry about dirt (IP6_).
? Health, fitness and sleep tracking is very accurate in my opinion, and surprisingly the NoiseFit sport app is also good. The breathe is just to take a break and just asks us to take a deep breathe. I found using a continuous heart rate sensor get the battery under 7 days and when this feature is turned off, it takes to almost 10 days.
? The sleep, heart rate and health tracking are pretty accurate in my opinion. Most of the features available in smart bands and basic smart watches were available.
? I can now read messages and notification from the band easily. From the app I was able to turn off and on what notifications need to be shown on the watch and notifications can be enabled for vibrations.
? There are some quick access shortcuts from the watch like find my phone, turn off/on continuous heart rate monitoring, Do not Disturb, wrist. The female health care feature of menstrual cycle and ovulations cycle is a nice add in my opinion.

-------------------------
?? WHAT I LIKED
-------------------------
? The premium design and great display. Much better than other smartwatches and bands in this category in my opinion.
? Battery life of 7 to 10 days.
? IPX68 dust and waterproof.
? Pretty accurate fitness, health and sleep monitoring
? Better control & display of calls, messages and music from the band

-------------------------------------------------
?? WHAT I FELT CAN BE IMPROVED
-------------------------------------------------
? More exercise or activities could have been included like Badminton etc.
? Only 5 watch faces available but heard there will be more added this year.

-------------------
?? OVERALL
-------------------
The MiBand 4 is definitely feature rich and Noise ColorFit Pro 2 has similar or a bit more features, I found this one much better in areas like build, design, charging. I don't have a Honor Band so I can't compare but at this price category in my perspective this band is the best. ??
\n  Just received the watch,premium quality,looks good, touch is sometym laggy, will report soon after usage about accuracy control and performance.\n

After using for 20 days, i am here to write a review. This product is well packed and user manual is good. You cant connect with your smartphone directly with bluetooth. You need to download noisefit app for that and need to connect your watch. Connectivity is good. Fraction of seconds delay on notification. Display is good, feel is good. Looks is very good. SNS, like whats app, msg, facebook and other app notification you can see only. You can see the first line of each notification, but cant enter into the msg. To read the msg you need to use your phone(unless the msg is one liner).
Heart rate monitor is closely correct. Step count is good. Sports mode is great. Real count of a cumulative of 3 steps. Alarm works well. Truly water proof(follow the IP68 standard). Dont use in salt water, it can damage.
My usage is very high and still i get 4 days battery back up. Its pretty good.

According to the cost of the product, you cant expect more than that. Its recommended to use this product.

column4: Smart choice over expensive smart watch
column5:
Background: I have recently purchased an iPhone XR. I really need a smart watch which can track my daily activity, give me a stylish look and provide me various notifications. As usual my first thought was about apple watch.

Why I preferred noise colorfit pro 2?
Apple watch is very nice, which is a real smart watch. But problem is poor battery life.

Do you really think of charging ur apple watch daily?
In today‚Äôs life already I hv wireless earpods, loud speaker and smartphone which need to be charged daily. Really I don‚Äôt want to add one more thing to the list.
Do you really need a smart watch to answer calls or reply messages when ur phn is in ur pocket or near by (bcoz if phn is not nearby then these features will not work)? If yes then believe me u r too lazy ??.

Pros of colorfit pro 2: stylish look, working flawlessly with my iPhone. I can receive all notifications, read messages, control music (working nicely with gaana app, even if gaana app is not open, by clicking play button songs can be played). The activity tracker is also working fine. Good battery life.

Cons: Only 5 watch faces (request to noise to update number of watch faces which ll make this watch awesome)
Under bright sunshine, screen is hardly visible (the only thing with respect to which amazfit bip lite is the winner)

Verdict: U can definitely try this watch though it is really not a smartwatch. In India, smartwatch technology is at nascent stage. So don‚Äôt expect much as compared to smartphones. Presently Smartwatch technology in India is like smartphone technology that was 5years ago. So better wait sometimes to use this smart technology at affordable price and let the rich people to enjoy the things for now??
\n Display qualilty is okay but other functions are best\n

column4: Great smart wearable at this price point!!
column5:
Great looking piece for a smart wearable at this price point! And let‚Äôs take nothing away from it, the product delivers to expectations and is practical to the core. So to sum it up -

What‚Äôs great -
1. Display is pretty
2. Long lasting battery
3. It‚Äôs waterproof and dust proof (a must have)
4. Light weight and ergonomic design
5. Setup is a breeze
6. Activity tracking, heart rate (continuous monitoring) and sleep statistics with added health and wellness feature is a boon
7. Capacitive touch panel is slick

Not so great -
1. Limited watch faces
2. Build quality can improve
3. Lacks camera remote module (basic fitness band version has it though)
4. Interface can improve to make it more intuitive

Overall a satisfactory product to own and worth recommending. Hope some of the highlighted creases get smoothened out with due course.
\n Amazing product i love it\n
\n Noise colorfit pro 2 is a great advanced version of colorfit pro... Great work of all function.. Best part of its lookout... Best value for ??.\n

I have been using it for around past 20 days and here's my review.
Aesthetic: It's best, almost look alike my series 2 apple watch.

Accuracy: Heart rate sensor is decent. Although not 100% accurate, I would say 75-80% accurate. Step counter accuracy: 80%

Response time: (when you face your wrist to see time): There's significant lag of 1-2 seconds which you wouldn't find in apple watch or any other high end watch like fit bit or samsung gear

Touch sensitivity: It's not as smooth as I was expecting but at this price range it's decent.

Colors: Colors are quite good in fact much better than amazfit bip lite or Lenovo smart watch.

Battery: Pretty powerful so far. Almost last for 10 days after full charge even when app notifications are always on and also heart rate sensor is continuesly on.

Note: You can't take call or reply for your whatsapp messages.

column4: Superb and amazing product. Just go for it.
column5:
I bought noise fit pro for my wife as a bday gift.i had gone through its review and most reviews we're positive. So I thought of buying it. Ordered the product in Amazon and got it within a week,Nicely packed.

Am happy about the product. Much more than my expectations. Value for money with respect to watches within that range.

Product review

ColorFit PRO 2 is the second generation of most popular smartwatch, the ColorFit Pro. In this new version, the ColorFit PRO 2 debuts a stylish new design and a gorgeous 1.3" full touch colour display. Now it also features complete health and activity tracking with 9 sports modes: walk, run, hike, bike, treadmill, work-out, climb, spin & yoga. ColorFit PRO 2 can show call, text & social media noti?cations, control music playback and more.

The biggest update to the ColorFit PRO 2 is an all-new 1.3" colour display which now features full capacitive touch, making it easier to read in sunlight and to control with taps and swipes.under sunlight also the screen very much visible.

ColorFit PRO 2's new super-light, impact-resistant polycarbonate watch case is now available in 3 gorgeous colours, with matching swappable straps that you can mix & match. Combine these with swappable watch faces to ?nd the perfect look, everyday!
ColorFit PRO 2 tracks and logs your e?orts with 9 sports modes, so you can walk, run, hike, bike, treadmill, work-out, climb, spin, and perform yoga with it.

ColorFit PRO 2 now features comprehensive activity & health tracking, with a 24/7 heart rate monitor, a sedentary alarm, a sleep monitor, plus step tracking and calories burned.

Take five wherever you are, with the new Breathe Mode on ColorFit PRO 2. It guides you with mindfulness and controlled breathing, lowering your heart rate and decreasing your stress level.

Without constantly staring at your phone. With full smartphone noti?cations up to 70 characters, for calls, texts & social media, plus music controls, all right on your wrist.

The water resistance rating on the new ColorFit PRO 2 is now up to an IP68 certi?cation so you never need to worry about getting it wet.

Female health tracking is also a very good feature of this watch.

Any ways I am impressed by this watch. Good design actually somewhat similar to apple. I will recommend this product to my friends for sure.

Any ways I am happy a

column4: If looking for Satisfactory Smart watch in low price, its a must buy.
column5:
I bought Noise colorfit pro 2 5months back, and i must say it is very satisfactory watch in such low price. It have all the fitness trackers and features. It gives you reminders of your periods and activities and more whichever you will set. You can also sync with your phone to get all your notifications. U can also pair with your music apps and change and play whaterver u like. I am most happy about the battery back. If it is connected with the phone the battery backup is almost 4 days.. n if u dont connect your phone with it, say u only use it for fitness and time then it lasts for weeks. I am very happy with the watch. N this is not my only buy.. i bought 2 more for my parents as well.
I must also mention here i use a 35k smart watch as well but i am much happier with this one and not that.

column4: 1/5 star as fitness watch and 2/5 stars as smart watch
column5:
1) You can clearly see sleep data is not recorded.
2) Heartrate samples are very random and only 2 samples during entire sleep time.
3) There is no analysis for activity tracking ( bands worth 2k gives you - Route, Conituous heart rate graph, Speed graph, heart zones) - In this application - we can just see average heart rate and distance(which is not accurate) and no further analysis.
4) Looks are good for the price, if you are looking for simple smart watch you can go ahead but features for fitness tracking is really poor.
5) There are other minor issues with notifications, but i dont want to go into detailed analysis.

column4: Please read this review before buying this product
column5:
Important: Please read bride buying
Hardware: The looks are good the activity mode has four modes that are good, there are stopwatch and timer which are also good, the battery backup is decent, it works for around 10 days.
Software: this is the most pathetic app that I have seen in my life. The app does not do the tracking which is the most important part of this product. This version or the latest version of the app is not able to track sleep hours at all, it will show you steps for today but by tomorrow everything will be gone. I have attached the screenshots of the app that shows that I have walked for only three days and slept for only three days in last 25 days of continuously wearing this device. The other screenshots are from the health app from Apple that shows my walking and sleeping trends.
The previous version of the app Was also not working as the app used to say update and there wasn‚Äôt any update in the App Store.
The app has been full of bugs from the beginning and I have seen it like that from last two months. You can verify my comments by going in the App Store or play store and sorting the reviews by latest first. I don‚Äôt think the app is going to improve in future
My verdict: please do not buy this otherwise you‚Äôll be disappointed. Thanks!

column4: Good looking outside but inside not even worth 1000
column5:
Have been using this for 2 months now. Already got LCD issues. Raised a complaint.

Pros:
1) Good looking, KIND of looks like Apple.. but kind of only
2) Light weight and makes the first look at it really nice,, but as saying is "looks can be deceiving"
2) Little less price than competition.

Cons:
1) Looks good but watch size is weird as compared to LCD size, looks out of place when turned on.
2) Touch is not free flow. Sometime have to slide 2-3 times to work.
3) Outer button is very heavy
4) ONLY 5 watch faces and all are very simple, not even one is as good as the competitors. Other companies providing 100's of watch faces. When contacted Gonoise, there answer is always that there will soon be an update. But they are busy releasing faces for NAV now and nothing on colorfit pro2.
5) Notifications not working with my OnePlus
6) Battery life comes out to be 4-5 days max, with bluetooth connectivity to 1 or 2 times a day to sync. Company claims 10 days, so this is 50% less.
7) Heart rate looks ambiguous. It gives a fluctuating reading between 40 to 100. I had Lenovo band which had pretty much stable heart rate.
8) Already facing hardware issues, with LCD getting white tint in corner and some discoloration in the center.

Overall i can say, I was happy to buy based on ratings and their publicity about the features, BUT soon realized its just a good looking,, good for nothing watch.
Look for other options before thinking of buying this, there are Cross, Huwaei and even if you have to increase budget go for it.

\n Synchronisation is not at all good. Watch get disconnected with in 10-15 minutes with mobile although application is running in mobile. All other things are fine. Due to disconnectivity you will not get each and every notification. Notification part isn't working as expected. Tried to complaint about this feature but this feature is not at all in the watch. And also there is no option to return and refund the watch. You can only get it replaced with another piece of watch. So be careful before buying some electronic items from Amazon now-a-days.\n
\n  Every thing is ok exept Bluetooth connection. Watch is disconnected each and every time.And it does not connect automatically have to search through app every time which is very irritating.\n

column4: Totally disappointed. Not working. Worst customer care
column5:
Previously i faced connection issue. Tgen i wrote to Noise and sent for exchange. They sent back the same device with full of scratches. With in 1 month now the screen displays like attached picture. Really i got disappointed with noise and my first worst experience with Amazon.

I dont what to do this with device. Waste of money.... Complete loss.

\n My first smartwatch. I think it has good value for money. For a low price of 2500 INR, I got a solid performer. I have had smartbands before, but they are like teasers for smartwatches. I wanted to have a proper smartwatch and decided to go with an Indian brand, since Indian brands like Noise and Boat have started making great products. I have to say, I am happy with my decision. The product is easy to use and setup. There have been no drops in connectivity since I have started using it. And most importantly, wearing it all day doesn't make me feel uncomfortable in anyway. It gives me a good track of what I need to know when I am working out and what to aim for. Now, I am really wondering, what is the value point for a smart watch? For 2500 INR I get features like heart rate monitoring, around 10 work out modes, calorie counter and notifications sync with my phone, what else is really needed for a smart watch?\n

column4: Surprise to see such Bad Product under fastrack brand.

Third as it was an Fastrack Band i didnt kept the original Package with me, hence i am not able to return it too.
In short its an compete waste of 1500 Bucks

All features work well.
Recommend to buy.

Edit: coming here after 3 to 4 months. There was some problem and my watch began to vibrate continuously.

We made a phone call to Fastrack company and a big thanks to Mr.Madan and his team.

 They gave the solution that let it vibrate and its battery go down, then when battery goes completely down keep it on charging.

 We did as they said. The problem was solved!! My watch is working well now.

 Once again thanks to Mr.Madan and his team.

column4: Effective for clearing ur stomach everyday.
column5:
1. This is the first time I bought any Apple Cider Vinegar in my life with the hope of losing my extra weight.
2. I hope this is the supposed colour & concentration of the ACV.
3. It tastes like a kharaab nimbu paani (lemon juice gone bad) without sugar, very Khatta.
It doesn't really smell if the bottle cap is open. U have to smell it taking the bottle near ur nose. Of course u won't do that, as u will be busy drinking it. Yes it doesn't smell when u put it in warm water.
4. If u have a digestion problem, it will help u solve it for sure.
I am having it since 4days, believe me.
Will be updating after a month too.
5. Packaging was good, should also have had a bubble plastic around in the gaps of the cardboard box.

7th February 2020.
U can't lose weight by drinking this ACV, u will have to exercise for that. but it definitely helps in clearing ur stomach, in the morning, everyday.

I'm using it for more than 5 months now. It helps in improving digestion and reducing belly fat but it will not work until and unless you hit the gym or do some workout and control ur diet. It's like combo effect of ACV + Dieting + Exercise = weight loss
If you think Apple Cider Vinegar is enough to control your weight, then you're wrong. It will not reduce even 500g of it. You have to control diet and track your calories but seriously, it's too good. Taste wise also it's really nice and I can see the results. Just use 2 tablespoon of it in lukewarm water in empty stomach in morning and same in evening after meal.

\n Been using it for a few weeks now.. no complaints as such. Quality seems good also. No drastic improvements in my weight..I've brought another bottle and so will continue using it for a while and see.\n

column4: ‚ÄúIt not burn fat just hels in weight loss‚Äù
column5:
Apple Cider Vinegar üçé
-
-
-
Apple cider vinegar, or cider vinegar, is a vinegar made from fermented apple juice, and used in salad dressings, marinades, vinaigrettes, food preservatives, and chutneys. It is made by crushing apples, then squeezing out the juice.
-
-
-
Benefits :-
Because of high amount of acidity apple cider vinegar is the best drink in weight loss, You lose weight faster when add Apple Cider Vinegar in your daily life but you have to do daily exercise otherwise it's burn your stomach.
-
-
-
Side effects :-
‚Ä¢ Delayed Stomach Emptying
‚Ä¢ Digestive Side Effects
‚Ä¢ Low Potassium Levels and Bone Loss
‚Ä¢ Erosion of Tooth Enamel
‚Ä¢ Throat Burns
‚Ä¢ Skin Burns
‚Ä¢ Drug Interactions

This jar has a good advantage that it can be easily used in humid climates as well.

Things to take care of
1) If you are in a city with humid climate then don't open the entire white seal, make a small cut and use coffee from there. That will give this coffee a long shelf life.
2) Once you receive the product, check the jar thoroughly. Mine was bubble wrapped so good protection
3) Check for expiry. This will last for three months max if you are a daily coffee drinker so it should have more time for expiry.

Helpful jar by Nestle :)

\n Awesome Phone. Nice upgrade from iPhone 6s to iPhone 11. Love this beautiful phone.\n

The iPhone design is good and the camera quality is awesome. You can also take pictures in wide angles and the image quality is awesome.

Phone got delivered at 9am on 28th September (I pre-order it on 27th September at 3am in the morning), I got my phone before the delivery date with nice and secured packaging.

The overall look of the phone is premium and face unlocking is fast. I grabbed this phone with HDFC 6K Instant Discount Offer at Just 64K (128 GB Variant).

Cons:

1. The phone is great but if you use "in the box" accessories like "EarPods with Lighting Connector", then you might feel a little pain in your ears.

2. The phone comes with 5W charger which charge your phone slowly. I recommend you to prefer using 18W charger.

Well, I've never tried the iPhone before and I'm using this for the first time (Yes, I'm already using other apple products like MacBook Air & Pro).

This will help you more. See if you are planning to buy iPhone 11. I will say. Yes.
But there are some plans I just want to disclose before you buy.
1) If you are an existing iPhone X/XS/XS Max/ XR user, better you guys do not think it to buy. You guys have more or less better gadget.
2) If you are an android user and planning to buy premium phone. I will suggest them to please buy iPhone instead of buying an Android. I bet you will never go back to android after using IOS.

Now I want to share my 2 month experience with iPhone 11.
1) Battery backup is 19 hours as I used it for 1 week.
2) Mind blowing Camera. Best is slow motion.
3) Very Handy. And look premium. If you have huge money then please go for Pro max.
4) Display is more or less good. Worth it because it is not Premium display and you are not paying for 11 Pro max.

column4: Overall a great phone just not a perfect one.
column5:
My mom got this phone after using oneplus 5t for 2 years and for change she wanted to try iOS. As she is not a heavy user and not a pixel peeper and also inclines towards fancy colored phones[previously lava red 5t] I thought of advising her to go for iPhone 11. Now coming to the phone or should I say iPhone, it is really a good one fulfilling many of its duties; I'll just list out a few points regarding the phone:
Pros:
A great camera with realistic colors[not highly saturated]
The best video recording on a mobile[as of Feb 2020]
Somewhere between great to excellent battery life
The software experience is great if you're into "apple way" of things and the whole experience is just FLUIDIC
The phone feels expensive and gives you a feel-good factor and also the build is pretty stellar even if some people are commenting that it's sides are alluminium and not steel.

Cons:
Many buyers and even youtubers are saying that the display is great and you wont notice the difference in day to day life but I dont want to sugarcoat things! The display is DECENT and NOT great! In day to day life with texting applications and general usage of phone you wont feel any difference, that is correct, BUT when you get into media apps like youtube, NETFLIX, ... etc you will notice the difference of lower resolution. there's just no escaping that fact.
You will also notice a great difference in screenshots containing text.
The display, in my opinion, would be the main deal breaker for me but in my case the phone is for my mom and she's not a tech geek and she's loving the purple color and the camera of the phone.
And also if you're into data transferring between your phone and your laptop[windows laptop] this phone will frustrate you for sure. For this I will suggest you to rely on cloud based services and not on manual cable sync process.

Conclusion with personal thoughts:
Overall the phone is a great one if you're not a tech geek and want the latest iPhone. It's also a great pick for those who want great hardware with flagship tech but prefer watching media on laptop or smart TV.
\n Happy Fillings\n

Pros:
Camera quality is 09/10.
Display 09/10
Battery life 10/10
Heating issue : I face no heating issue
Product genuineess : Checked on apple site it is original.
Cons: charging speed very slow. Charger should be provided atleast 18 watt.
